name: The Awakened Fate Ultimatum
description:
Do you have what it takes to become God? Find out in The Awakened Fate Ultimatum, the latest roguelike RPG from Nippon Ichi Software, Inc. Wield the powers of angels and devils as you traverse randomly generated dungeons and make decisions that will change the fate of the world!

1 player
5MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems activated by this account.
